meanings.definition: The quality or state of being different or diverse.
meanings.sent1: The garden had a variety of colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the variety of flavors in the ice cream shop.
meanings.sent3: The variety of animals at the zoo made me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe had a variety of styles, from elegant to casual.
meanings.sent5: The variety of fruits at the market was overwhelming.

meanings.definition: A number or collection of different things or people.
meanings.sent1: The store offers a variety of snacks for customers.
meanings.sent2: There was a wide variety of books in the library.
meanings.sent3: The variety of toys in the store excited the children.
meanings.sent4: The variety of colors in the painting created a beautiful scene.
meanings.sent5: The variety of music genres at the concert pleased everyone.

meanings.definition: A particular type or kind of something.
meanings.sent1: She chose a variety of cupcakes for the party.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells a variety of bread, from sourdough to rye.
meanings.sent3: The variety of shoes in her closet was impressive.
meanings.sent4: His collection had a variety of stamps from different countries.
meanings.sent5: The restaurant offers a variety of dishes to suit every taste.
